title.rendered: “Massive Search Operation for Missing 14-Year-Old Boy in Malachi Hashalom: An Insight into IDF’s Ground and Air Efforts”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF forces from the air and ground, including special forces, have been operating since the early afternoon along with the Israeli police and additional forces in search for the missing 14-year-old boy since this morning in the Malachi Hashalom area of the Benjamin brigade.

The commander of Central Command, the commander of Judea and Samaria Division and the commander of the Benjamin Brigade are on the ground directing the forces in the search for the boy.

The forces are blocking roads and conducting sweeps in the area.

Attached images of the forces sweep in the area: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC12042024483476083
